last_episode_to_air.name: God of Manmin Who Went to Prison
last_episode_to_air.overview: As his church grows in size, Lee Jae-rock solicits excessive gifts and offerings from followers. He later stands trial for charges of sexual assault.

name: In the Name of God: A Holy Betrayal
overview: This docuseries examining the chilling true stories of four Korean leaders claiming to be prophets exposes the dark side of unquestioning belief.

episodes.name: JMS, God's Brides
episodes.overview: Jeong Myeong-seok amasses thousands of followers with his prophecies and healing powers. But women formerly close to the leader reveal a darker truth.

episodes.name: JMS, Messiah on Red Notice
episodes.overview: As more reports of Jeong Myeong-seok's abuses go public, he flees and continues his work abroad. Meanwhile, his enemies face violent retaliation.

episodes.name: JMS, Messiah with Electronic Anklets
episodes.overview: Jeong Myeong-seok faces prison time after being arrested in China. But even after his release, former followers describe continued disturbing offenses.

episodes.name: Five Oceans, God and 32 Dead Bodies
episodes.overview: Park Soon-ja's seemingly successful company is called into question when she and 31 others are found dead, leading to an investigation into the cause.

episodes.name: The Baby Garden, On the Way to the Heaven
episodes.overview: Kim Ki-soon rises to power and starts the Baby Garden commune. Former members expose the disturbing conditions within.

episodes.name: The Baby Garden of Death
episodes.overview: After reports of several deaths at the Baby Garden, prosecutors take Kim Ki-soon to court. But inconsistent witness testimonies complicate the trial.

episodes.name: The Man Who Became God of Manmin
episodes.overview: Pastor Lee Jae-rock's miraculous healing abilities draw a large congregation to Manmin Central Church. Soon, his influence spreads internationally.

episodes.name: God of Manmin Who Went to Prison
episodes.overview: As his church grows in size, Lee Jae-rock solicits excessive gifts and offerings from followers. He later stands trial for charges of sexual assault.
